statements.query: MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSVpc)<-[:ACCEPTER_VPC]-(n:AWSPeeringConnection) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSAccount{id: $AWS_ID})-[:RESOURCE]->(:AWSVpc)<-[:REQUESTER_VPC]-(n:AWSPeeringConnection) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (n:AWSCidrBlock)<-[:BLOCK_ASSOCIATION]-(:AWSVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSCidrBlock)<-[r:BLOCK_ASSOCIATION]-(:AWSVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:AWSVpc)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
MATCH (:AWSVpc)<-[r:RESOURCE]-(:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (:AWSVpc)-[r:VPC_PEERING]-(:AWSVpc) WHERE r.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH r LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DELETE (r)
MATCH (n:AWSAccount{foreign: true}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> $UPDATE_TAG WITH n LIMIT $LIMIT_SIZE DETACH DELETE (n)
